attributes.action: Reallocate the £8m King's portrait fund to the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Everyone in this country depends on the NHS; I, like many, owe it my life. If the government can find £8m for pictures, it can spend that money on things that are of real value to the people.
attributes.background: Pictures don't save lives; medical equipment does. Why spend £8m on portraits when you could spend it on patients?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636089
